meals.name: Instant Pot Chicken & Vegetables
meals.description: One-pot meal with frozen vegetables and pre-seasoned chicken
meals.instructions:
1. Add frozen chicken, broth, garlic, and seasoning to Instant Pot
2. Pressure cook HIGH 15 minutes, quick release
3. Shred chicken with forks, add frozen vegetables
4. Sauté mode 3 minutes to heat vegetables
5. Heat rice packets in microwave 90 seconds
6. Serve chicken and vegetables over rice

meals.name: Instant Pot Turkey Chili
meals.description: One-pot meal that makes great leftovers
meals.instructions:
1. Sauté mode: brown turkey in Instant Pot 5 minutes
2. Add all other ingredients except yogurt
3. Pressure cook HIGH 20 minutes, quick release
4. Serve in bowls topped with Greek yogurt
5. Makes 6+ servings for easy leftovers
6. Freezes perfectly for future quick meals!

meals.name: No-Cook Protein Bowls
meals.description: Zero cooking required - perfect for busy weekends
meals.instructions:
1. Open and drain chickpeas, rinse quickly
2. Assemble salad kits in bowls
3. Top with chicken, chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber
4. Add sliced avocado
5. Drizzle with dressing
6. Eat from bowl - one dish per person!
